channel.title: Make half the world wild
channel.description:
Hello, my server is based on dodian, devolutionv7.
In order to make my server more fun, i wanted to make half the world wild, so when people go on that side they can be killed by anyone, and when there not on there side, there safe.
here is an idea of what i want, So how would i go about doing this, please explain in detail because im a beginner. thankyou
[img]http://img115.imageshack.us/img115/7937/wwildny2.png[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 01:49:48 AM[/size][hr]also, who ever helps will get Admin status[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 10:58:53 AM[/size][hr]can someone please help
